newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Brazil monetary body meets to set basic rate.
newsitem.headline: Brazil monetary body meets to set basic rate.

text.p: Brazil's Monetary Policy Committee (Copom) has started a meeting to set September's Basic Interest Rate of the Central Bank (TBC), but no announcement was expected before 2200 local time/0100 GMT, a spokesman said.
The Central Bank spokesman said the TBC for September would be announced to the markets via the bank's computer system.
The Copom meeting is taking place some 10 days earlier than expected. August's TBC was set at 1.9 percent.
